DOC.detailed_description: Fatty emulsion indispensable part parenteral nutrition , deliver energy essential fatty acid . Furthermore , lipid involve structure function cell membrane receptor , modify gene expression , modulate inflammatory immune response . In addition , fatty acid precursor prostaglandin eicosanoids therefore important metabolic functions.A promise substrate development lipid emulsion see fish oil contain solution . With regard current literature , fish oil potential benefical influence pathophysiological response endotoxins exert important modulation eicosanoid cytokine biology . However , study avaibale compare fish oil contain fatty emulsion lipid emulsion base olive soybean oil regard inflammatory response hepatic function . Therefore , aim study evaluate effect new lipid emulsion base ob soybean oil , medium-chain triglyceride , olive oil fish oil compare lipid emulsion base olive soybean oil inflammatory response hepatic function postoperative intensive care unit ( ICU ) patient .
DOC.criteria: 1880 year Elective operative procedure , indication parenteral nutrition 5 postoperative day ASA IIII Haemoglobin > 10 g/dl Ability acceptance agree study participation Written inform consent Liver insufficiency ( ASAT , ALAT > 40 U/l ) Renal insufficiency ( creatinine > 1.4 mg/dl ) Pancreas insufficiency Emergencies Women child bear age miss negative pregnancy test , pregnancy lactation Diseases central nervous system ( M. Parkinson multiple sclerosis ) Alcohol drug abuse ( include opioid abuse ) Acute pulmonary oedema Decompensated cardiac insufficiency Insulindependent diabetes mellitus Overweight ( body mass index > 30 kg/m2 Cachexia ( body mass index < 18 kg/m2 ) Psychiatric disorder Hypersensitivity egg , coconut soy proteins Patients take chronic corticoid Allergy study agent Refusal patient participate study Participation another study project
